lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador’s overall lead decreased by 38 seconds in the 19th stage of the Giro d’Italia.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Cycling; Contador’s Lead Shrinks

snippet: Alberto Contador’s overall lead decreased by 38 seconds in the 19th stage of the Giro d’Italia.
abstract: Alberto Contador's overall lead in 19th stage of Giro d’Italia decreases by 38 seconds; Fabio Aru wins mountain stage.
